org.apache.distributedlog.metadata

Class LogMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.distributedlog.metadata.LogMetadata
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LogMetadataForReader, LogMetadataForWriter

    public class LogMetadata
extends Object
    Class to represent the layout and metadata of the zookeeper-based log metadata
